QuestData.Title: Sparks of Life: The Azure Span
QuestData.Description:
The tides have come in, and they've brought a bounty of life with them to the Azure Span.
It's a time for friends, family, good food, and forging new stories.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Sparks of Life in the Azure Span, while in War Mode.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Fieldmaster Emberath in Valdrakken.
